thread.title: Patrick & Jacqueline Dwyer
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Patrick & Jacqueline Dwyer

author: Patrick & Jacqueline Dwyer
title: Patrick & Jacqueline Dwyer
text: This is our second car we bought from Steve Price and once again it was a smooth experience! He is by far the best guy to work with when it comes to looking for and buying a car. We recommend him to everyone we know. Thanks Steve!
